meanings.definition: the act of maintaining or improving a yard or outdoor space
meanings.sent1: My dad enjoys doing yardworks on weekends to keep our garden beautiful.
meanings.sent2: Professional yardworks can make a big difference in the appearance of your home.
meanings.sent3: After hours of yardworks, I realized I had accidentally planted flowers in the shape of a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The yardworks transformed the backyard into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly cut grass lingered in the air after the yardworks were done.

meanings.definition: a company or business that specializes in landscaping and yard maintenance
meanings.sent1: We hired a yardworks to help us redesign our front yard.
meanings.sent2: The yardworks we hired did an amazing job with our lawn.
meanings.sent3: The yardworks accidentally planted a garden gnome in the middle of the lawn.
meanings.sent4: The yardworks company turned our dull yard into a vibrant outdoor oasis.
meanings.sent5: The yardworks business offered a variety of services to improve outdoor spaces.

meanings.definition: tools or equipment used for yard maintenance or landscaping
meanings.sent1: My neighbor borrowed my yardworks to trim his hedges.
meanings.sent2: Having the right yardworks can make gardening tasks much easier.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my yardworks out in the rain, and now they're all rusty.
meanings.sent4: The shiny new yardworks gleamed in the sunlight as I started my gardening project.
meanings.sent5: Investing in quality yardworks can save you time and effort in maintaining your yard.
